The program operated by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs under subchapter III of chapter 19 of title 38, United States Code, is renamed as the Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance program. Amendments are made to various sections of Chapter 19 to reflect this change. The heading of subchapter III is also updated to "SERVICEMEMBERS' GROUP LIFE INSURANCE (FORMERLY SERVICEMEN'S GROUP LIFE INSURANCE)". The heading of section 1974 is amended to "Advisory Council on Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance (formerly Servicemen's Group Life Insurance)". Amendments are made to the table of sections in Chapter 19 to reflect the change to "servicemembers' group life insurance". SEC. 5. MERGER OF RETIRED RESERVE SERVICEMEMBERS' GROUP LIFE INSURANCE AND VETERANS' GROUP LIFE INSURANCE AND EXTENSION OF VETERANS' GROUP LIFE INSURANCE TO MEMBERS OF THE READY RESERVE. Amendments are made to sections 1315(f)(1)(F), 3017(a), and 3224(1) to replace "servicemen's" with "servicemembers". Amendments are made to sections 1965(5) and 1967 regarding the definition of a member and persons insured. Subparagraphs (C) and (D) are removed, and subparagraph (E) is redesignated as subparagraph (C). Subsection (d) is also removed from section 1967. Amendments are made to section 1968, including the redesignation of subsections and changes to the duration and termination of coverage. Amendments are made to section 1969, including the removal of certain subparagraphs and paragraphs, as well as the striking out of the last two sentences in subsection (b). Amendments to section 1969 include removing certain subparagraphs and paragraphs, as well as redesignating subsections in accordance with specific qualifications for the Retired Reserve. SEC. 6. CONVERSION TO COMMERCIAL LIFE INSURANCE POLICY. SGLI Conversion: Amends section 1968 to automatically convert to Veterans' Group Life Insurance or individual policy upon written application. The amendment includes changes to the conversion process for Veterans' Group Life Insurance, specifying conditions for payment and automatic conversion from Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance. The amendment specifies conditions for payment of Veterans' Group Life Insurance, including limitations based on coverage under Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance. It also outlines the termination of the Veterans' Group Life Insurance policy upon the effective date of an individual policy. The Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance of Retired Reserve members will be converted to Veterans' Group Life Insurance 90 days after the enactment of the Act.
